__TOC__

=== Ubucon Baltic ===

Ubucon Baltic is an exhibition of FOSS and a conference that should be held in spring 2009. This event is for people from Baltic region and the first one will be held in Vilnius, Lithuania.

=== Want to help? ===

Anyone can join the organizational work group. Just subscribe to a <nowiki>[[http://groups.google.com/group/ubucon-baltic|mailing list]]</nowiki> by sending a message to ubucon-baltic-subscribe@googlegroups.com

Say "Hello", tell us what you should be able to do and follow the discussion.
